Uses of Class
general.Classifier

  • Packages that use Classifier 
    Package Description
    classifyFurnishing  

    • Uses of Classifier in classifyFurnishing

      Subclasses of Classifier in classifyFurnishing 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BedClassifier
      Notice: Don't run it as it is because modelDir and libs are hardcoded here 注意: 不要直接运行因为modelDir和libs是编码在源文件里的 A Classifier dealing with six categories of beds:
      single-bed, hammock, double-bed, baby-bed(cot), bunk-bed, round-bed       分类6类床：单人床、吊床、双人床、宝宝床（有栏杆的）、双层床和圆床的分类器
      class  FurnishingClassifier
      Notice: Don't run it as it is because modelDir and libs are hardcoded here 注意: 不要直接运行因为modelDir和libs是编码在源文件里的 classifies only three categories, wall-paper, wooden-floor, floor-tile 分类3类贴图：墙纸、墙砖、地板
      class  HardwareClassifier
      Notice: Don't run it as it is because modelDir and libs are hardcoded here 注意: 不要直接运行因为modelDir和libs是编码在源文件里的 classifies 8 categories of hardware:
      carpet,wall-cloth,leather,wood,wall-paper, paint, brick, tile       分类8类硬装贴图：墙纸、墙布、皮革、木头、地毯、墙砖、地砖、涂料
      class  StyleClassifier
      Notice: Don't run it as it is because modelDir and libs are hardcoded here 注意: 不要直接运行因为modelDir和libs是编码在源文件里的 classifies 4 categories of furnishing styles:
      western-luxurious, western-simple, Chinese, Japanese       分类4类装修风格：西式奢华、西式简约、中式和日式
